fewSteps.title: In a few steps to a personal loan.

step1.title: Apply for a loan online
step1.text: Simply specify the desired amount and complete the application conveniently online. With the "Personal Loan Sofort", the credit decision is made immediately based on the digital account check and the comparison of your specified data.

step2.title: Identify online
step2.text: With Video-Ident, you confirm your identity online. Alternatively, the POSTIDENT procedure is also available for the "Personal Loan Klassisch".

step3.title: Sign application (digitally)
step3.text: With the "Personal Loan Sofort", you create your digital signature with a TAN that is sent to your mobile phone. This appears in the form of a seal on your loan agreement (Note: This service is available Mon.-Fri. between 7 a.m. and 10 p.m.). With the "Personal Loan Klassisch", you have the option to submit your signed contract by post. Alternatively, you register in the DKB portal and can also sign digitally here.

step4.title: Desired amount in your account
step4.text: With a positive credit decision, the amount is in your account in the shortest possible time ("Personal Loan Sofort") or within a few days ("Personal Loan Klassisch").
